pages.title: Japanese Giant Salamander
pages.text: The Japanese giant salamander ($(o)Andrias japonicus$()) is a species of salamander in the family Cryptobranchidae.$(br2)The species is endemic to Japan, where it is known as Ōsanshōuo ($(o)オオサンショウウオ/大山椒魚$()), literally meaning "giant pepper fish".
